event.title: was declared a national disaster area after the Teton Dam flood of June 5, 1976

data.event: Madison County was declared a national disaster area after the Teton Dam flood of June 5, 1976.

event.title: the county's vote on three occasions, Ronald Reagan in 1984

data.event: In that same period Republican presidential candidates polled more than 90 percent of the county's vote on three occasions, Ronald Reagan in 1984, George W. Bush in 2004, and Mitt Romney in 2012.

event.title: came close to this level in 2008

data.event: John McCain came close to this level in 2008, drawing 85 percent of the vote.
